text: Michael Gordon RobertsMike Roberts player profile Scrum.com (born 20 February 1946) is a former Wales international rugby union player. He attended Ruthin School. In 1971 he toured New Zealand with the British and Irish Lions and at the time played club rugby for London Welsh RFC. ==Notes== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:British and Irish Lions rugby union players from Wales Category:London Welsh RFC players Category:Barbarian F.C. players Category:Oxford University RFC players Category:Wales international rugby union players
